title: Desktop Survivors 98
description:
Survive against waves of enemies in quick, intense rounds as you explore the randomly generated dungeons. Your cursor becomes the hero, battling against foes in a bullet hell frenzy that tests your reflexes, precision, and decision-making. Danganronpa 2: Goodbye Despair
Desktop Survivors 98 doesn’t play in a window — it plays over your desktop. Enemies, upgrades, and chaos unfold across your real screen.
Whether you’re looking for a quick break or an extended challenge, Desktop Survivors 98 fits perfectly into your routine. With its fast-paced rounds and the ability to toggle the game at any moment, you’re always just a click away from diving back into the action.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz or equivalent
system_requirements.Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent) or better
